name: zkCross Network
description: Introduction to zkCross Network zkCross Network is a DeFi and AI infrastructure provider, dedicated to unifying Web3 with seamless user onboarding, cross-chain liquidity, and intuitive DeFi experiences. Our vision is to remove the complexity of interacting with multiple blockchains, allowing anyone—from crypto newcomers to seasoned DeFi enthusiasts—to explore, trade, and earn with minimal friction. Our Flagship Product: SuperAccounts SuperAccounts is more than just a wallet—it’s a fully decentralised, AI-powered DeFi SuperApp designed to make the entire crypto experience as intuitive as sending a text. By leveraging advanced Chain Abstraction and Cross AI, SuperAccounts goes beyond basic storage and trading to become your all-in-one, automated finance assistant. AI Agents for Every Task At the heart of SuperAccounts are AI Agents, which cover a wide range of DeFi activities: Smart Trading Tools Effortlessly buy and sell crypto using “Text to Trade” prompts, set advanced limit orders, or automate strategies to run 24/7 without human intervention. Risk Management & Security Define personalised risk boundaries, receive security warnings on potential scams or rug pulls, and use volatility alerts to navigate market shifts confidently. Staking & Yield Farming Find the highest APYs, compare staking protocols, and optimise yields with AI-driven insights—turning complex multi-chain strategies into one-click operations. Alerts & Notifications Stay ahead of the curve with custom price alerts, liquidation warnings, and real-time gas fee updates across supported networks. Research & Analytics Harness AI to discover emerging tokens, gauge market sentiment, track whale movements, and even forecast prices with data-driven predictions. User Education From DeFi how-tos to in-depth blockchain basics, SuperAccounts houses a library of quick lessons that empower both newcomers and power users. Instant Action With Quick Prompts Want to stake USDT in the top ROI pool on Base or buy $100 of a new Solana token from your Bitcoin balance? Quick prompts let you perform these tasks in a single sentence. Whether you’re setting stop-losses, scheduling alerts for trending tokens, or auto-trading based on market signals, SuperAccounts turns complex DeFi actions into a conversation—no bridging or clunky manual steps required.
